page.title: 09LOCAL INDUSTRY.
page.content: BEARDSHALLS:Employs 20 people.Is a mineral water manufacturer and bottler.The present owner is Mr.Mykola Michejew,who is of Polish extraction.His firm sells various drinks mineral waters and beers bottled under licence and various edibles such as crisps etc. DODWORTH INDUSTRIAL ESTATE:Lowfields Distribution Ltd.is the biggest company in Dodworth.Part of Imperial Foods Ltd.Delivers food and drink to Lincolnshire,Yorkshire,Derbyshire and Nottinghamshire.Lowfield was opened in 1973 and now covers 65,000 square feet,and deals with 110,000 cases a week.72 people work at Lowfield,19% of whom come from Dodworth.There is a fleet of 23 lorries,mainly Ford.The largest cost about Â£35,000.Lowfield now relies on computer technology,and attributes it's success to this.
